org.phantomapi.clust

Interface Configurable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Hyve, HyveBlock, HyveChunk, HyveEntity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Analytical, BaseHyve, BaseHyveBlock, BaseHyveChunk, BlockMeta, ChunkMeta, Config, ConfigurableController, ConfigurableObject, ConfigurableWorld, ConfigurationBackupController, DevelopmentController, HotLoadController, HRBSchematic, HyveController, LanguageController, MySQLConnectionController, PhantomGameObject, PlayerData, PlayerDataManager, PPAController, RebootController, RedisConnectionController, SchematicMeta, ServerThread, SpeechMesh

    public interface Configurable
    Make an object configurable
    Author:
    cyberpwn

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getCodeName()
      The code name is the file name EXCLUDING .yml.
      DataCluster getConfiguration()
      Get the DataCluster object for this object.
      void onNewConfig()
      Called when a configuration needs to be structured.
      void onReadConfig()
      Called when the config has been read and the DataCluster object has been modified.

    • Method Detail

      • onNewConfig

        void onNewConfig()
        Called when a configuration needs to be structured. Place default values and paths here

      • onReadConfig

        void onReadConfig()
        Called when the config has been read and the DataCluster object has been modified. Ofcourse, you could just read directly from the DataCluster object when needed instead of creating bload variables

      • getConfiguration

        DataCluster getConfiguration()
        Get the DataCluster object for this object. Needed for writing and reading
        Returns:
        the DataCluster object

      • getCodeName

        String getCodeName()
        The code name is the file name EXCLUDING .yml. For example if you need the file name as "config.yml", ensure it is returned as "config".
        Returns:
        the desired code name
